title: Vertex AI - Vertex AI IAM permissions
abstract:
# Vertex AI - Vertex AI IAM permissions
The following table lists Vertex AI operations and the permissions they require.
To determine if one or more **permissions** are included in a [Vertex AI IAM role](/vertex-ai/docs/general/access-control) , you can use one of the following methods:
- The [gcloud iam roles describe](/sdk/gcloud/reference/iam/roles/describe) command
- The [roles.get()](/iam/reference/rest/v1/roles/get) method in the IAM API
content:
## What's next
- For information about Vertex AI predefined, basic and custom roles, as well as general information about service accounts and agents, see [Access control](/vertex-ai/docs/general/access-control) .
- For detailed information about controlling permissions with a custom service account, see [Using a custom service account](/vertex-ai/docs/general/custom-service-account) .
- Learn more about using IAM to access resources in the [Granting, changing, and revoking access to resources](/iam/docs/granting-changing-revoking-access) topic of the IAM documentation.
